author: Mrs Emily Cooper
description: The classic pineapple and coconut combo with a touch of rum funk and subdued apricot.Smashes are usually short drinks that include muddled mint. Strictly according to cocktail family rules, this drink might be misnamed, but like all the miss-named fruit "Martinis" that are not actually Martinis, it's tasty and has mass-market appeal.
name: Goombay Smash

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
